Package fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.lib.core

Provides all core classes and method to do extraction and listing of mail boxes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DateRange
    Class for automatic computation of start and end date of folders.
    MailBoxFolder
    Abstract class for a mail box folder.
    MailBoxMessage
    Abstract class for a mail box message.
    StoreExtractor
    Abstract factory class for operation context on a defined mailbox.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ExtractionException
    Class for all exceptions thrown by the mailextract classes These exceptions are always fatal for the extraction or listing process.

Package fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.lib.core Description

Provides all core classes and method to do extraction and listing of mail boxes.

It uses JavaMail to access IMAP account and Thunderbird mbox director, and libpst to access Outlook pst files.
